name: Navigating through a sea of happy little doodles in a tiny boat
name_original: Navigating through a sea of happy little doodles in a tiny boat
description:
Click doodles and do fun little quests as you row around in your tiny boat! 

How fast can you complete the game?

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left click to interact with doodles
  • Right click to touch/hold doodles
